Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (66.67%) toPP-129W: 33%, R: 25%, P: 17%.Chemical modification: C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against S. warneri (MIC 4 ug/ml), S. epidermidis (MIC 8 ug/ml), E. faecalis (MIC 32 ug/ml), A. baumannii (MIC 32 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae (MIC 32 ug/ml), and P.aeruginosa (MIC 128 ug/ml).In vitro toxicity: rabbit RBC 4% (HC50 >2000 ug/ml), not hemo.lytic.Structure: structure unclear in SDS in CD spectrum.
Literature Information.Author: Wang S, Ong ZY, Qu S, Wang Y, Xin J, Zheng Z, Wu H. 2024
Literature Information.Reference: ACS Biomater Sci Eng. 2024 Oct 25. doi: 10.1021/acsbiomaterials.4c01544.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Omiganan-Based Synthetic Antimicrobial Peptides for the Healthcare of Infectious Endophthalmitis.
